column1: Little Goat Diner////My partner enjoyed his crazy kimchee & bacon & eggs & pancakes thing
column2: and he also loved his oh god
column3: goat chili. Due to all the cute goat mascots plastered everywhere
column4: that one weirded me out for a little bit. It didn't stop me from stealing a bit of the crunchy topping off his chili which was really tasty
